section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by temporary legislation that will expire on April 9, 2024.*
section.heading: Certificate of assurance moratorium.
section.text: Notwithstanding the requirements of § 42-3502.21, beginning on November 2, 2020, no owner of a housing accommodation shall request a certificate of assurance, and the Mayor shall not issue a certificate of assurance for any request received.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 2 of Certificate of Assurance Moratorium Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-454, Nov. 4, 2020, 67 DCR 13216).
For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 2 of Certificate of Assurance Moratorium Temporary Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Law 23-173, Dec. 23, 2020, 67 DCR 13228).

For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 2 of Certificate of Assurance Moratorium Extension Temporary Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Law 24-33, Sept. 22, 2021, 68 DCR 007987).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 2 of Certificate of Assurance Moratorium Extension Emergency Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-418, May 23, 2022, 69 DCR 6223).
For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 2 of Certificate of Assurance Moratorium Extension Temporary Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Law 24-157, Aug. 27, 2022, 69 DCR 008371).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 2 of Certificate of Assurance Moratorium Extension Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-59, Mar. 24, 2023, 70 DCR 3816).
For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 2 of Certificate of Assurance Moratorium Extension Temporary Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Law 25-18, June 14, 2023, 70 DCR 6337).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 2 of Certificate of Assurance Moratorium Second Extension Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-354, Jan. 10, 2024, 0 DCR 0).
